flawed_nl_solution:
40% of the class is boys because 100-60=<<100-60=40>>40
There are 10.0 boys because 25x0.4=<<25*0.4=10.0>>10.0
60% of the boys don't like playing basketball because 100-40=<<100-40=90>>90
6.0 boys don't like playing basketball because 10.0x0.6=6.0
12.0 girls like playing basketball because 6.0x2=<<6.0*2=12.0>>12.0
There are 15.0 girls in the class because 25-10.0=<<25-10.0=15.0>>15.0
80% of the girls in class like playing basketball because 12.0/15.0=<<12.0/15.0=0.8>>0.8

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 60, not 90. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
